member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_HEVC
member.summary: Specifies the type of an HEVC video frame.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_HEVC.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_HEVC_P_FRAME
member.summary: P-Frame. Allows references to past frames.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_HEVC.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_HEVC_B_FRAME
member.summary: B-Frame. Allows references to both past and future (in display order) frames.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_HEVC.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_HEVC_IDR_FRAME
member.summary: Instantaneous decode refresh frame. A special type of I-frame where no frame after it can reference any frame before it.
